sourcesContent: module.exports = require("vue");

<template lang="pug">
  div
    p Home component
    p(v-for='m in messages') {{m}}
</template>
<script>
export default {
  asyncData ({ store, route }) {
    // возвращаем Promise из действия
    // return store.dispatch('fetchItem', route.params.id)
  },
  computed: {
      messages : function () {
          return this.$store.state.messages
      }
  },
  methods: {

  }
}
</script>

<template lang="pug">
  div 
    span {{counter}}
    button("v-on:click"='inc') +
    p item component {{counter}}
    div {{users}}
</template>
<script>
export default {
   asyncData ({ store, route }) {
    return store.dispatch("users");
    },
  computed: {
      counter : function () {
          return this.$store.state.count
      },
      users : function () {
          return this.$store.state.users
      }
  },
  methods : {
      inc : function() {
          this.$store.dispatch("inc")
      }
  }
}
</script>
module.exports = require("vue-router");
module.exports = require("vuex");
module.exports = require("vuex-router-sync");
module.exports = require("vue-axios");
module.exports = require("axios");

<template lang="pug">
    div#input
        input(v-model="message")
        button("@click"="send")
</template>
<script>
export default {
    props: ["socket"],
    data () {
        return {
            message: ""
        }
    },
    methods : {
        send : function(){
        console.log('send')
        console.log(this.socket)
        
        this.socket.send(JSON.stringify({
            type:"message",
            message: this.message
        }));
        this.message = "";
    }
    }
}
</script>

<template lang="pug">
  div#app
    h3 new template with pug
    div
        p root component
        button("v-on:click"='start') Start
        router-link(to="/item") item
        router-link(to="/") home   
    router-view
    control(:socket="socket")

</template>
<script>
import control from "@components/Control"
export default {
  asyncData ({ store, route }) {
  },
  components : {
      control
  },
  data() {
      return {
          socket : {},
        //   message : ""
      }
  },
  methods: {
    start : function(){
        console.log('gamestart')
        this.socket.send(JSON.stringify({
            type: "gamestart",
            // value: outgoingMessage
        }));
    }
  },
  computed: {
      counter : function () {
          return this.$store.state.count
      }
  },
  beforeMount(){
      let v = this;

       this.socket = new WebSocket("ws://localhost:8081");

       this.socket.onopen = () => {
            this.socket.send(JSON.stringify({
                type : "auth",
                message : prompt("Name")
            }));
        }

        this.socket.onmessage = function(event) {
            var incomingMessage = event.data;
            v.$store.dispatch("mes",incomingMessage); 
        };
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="stylus">

</style>
